verses.name: Exodus 36:25
verses.text: And for the other side of the tabernacle, which is toward the north corner, he made twenty boards,

verses.name: Exodus 36:26
verses.text: And their forty sockets of silver; two sockets under one board, and two sockets under another board.

verses.name: Exodus 36:27
verses.text: And for the sides of the tabernacle westward he made six boards.

verses.name: Exodus 36:28
verses.text: And two boards made he for the corners of the tabernacle in the two sides.

verses.name: Exodus 36:29
verses.text: And they were coupled beneath, and coupled together at the head thereof, to one ring: thus he did to both of them in both the corners.
